metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12930 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: ntfs_end_buffer_async_read in the ntfs.ko filesystem driver in the Linux kernel 4.15.0 allows attackers to trigger a stack-based out-of-bounds write and cause a denial of service (kernel oops or panic) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted ntfs filesystem.

notes.Note: sbeattie> As of 2019-09-06, there is no upstream fix available

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
